ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Verant's new security policy..
ygData.msgSnippet: I know! Especially since some hackers can find software on warez sights to hack into all sorts of info down to usernames and passwords for just about anything.
ygData.messageBody:
I know! Especially since some hackers can find software on warez sights to
hack into all sorts of info down to usernames and passwords for just about
anything.
They are so suspicious of their customers... it's really sad.
luv,
-Su

> What do you all think of this? Verant says the investigations on
compromised
> accounts take away too much time for the GMs to do customer support, so
now
> they are just going to ban all accounts that are compromised.. That's what
I
> call really f-in BAD customer support.. It's like an insurance.. Knowing
> that if someone steals your car, or breaks into it and steal your brand
new
> Lodizal Shell Stereo, the insurance company will help you out and cough up
a
> new one for you.. Verant sux! Maybe they could charge a fee like the
> insurance companies do, from people whos accounts have been compromised in
> order to investigate and rectify the situation, but BAN THEM? That is SO
> F-IN WRONG!
>
> - Avron K'Nighit - Paladin 48
> - Dunbar Keglifter - Cleric 59
> - Meron Shadowdale - Rogue 53
>
>
